com.jcraft.jsch

Class ChannelForwardedTCPIP

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcraft.jsch.Channel
      • com.jcraft.jsch.ChannelForwardedTCPIP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class ChannelForwardedTCPIP
extends Channel
    A Channel created when a forwarded port at the remote side is connected. This is used internally to forward remote ports to servers at the local side or to local daemons.
    See Also:
    Session.setPortForwardingR(String, int, String, int, SocketFactory), Session.setPortForwardingR(String, int, String, Object[]), RFC 4254, section 7.2 TCP/IP Forwarding Channels

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.jcraft.jsch.Channel

        type

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getRemotePort()
      retrieves the local port at the remote side where this TCP connection came in.
      void run()
      Not for external use - the channel transfer loop.
